channel.title: Lynxscape v6.0 [already? just for you guys]
channel.description:
I Made this Server using the base of PimpScape
[size=2]Before we Start, When Posting, Please give me suggestions coz im running real low[/size]
[size=5]LYNXSCAPE[/size]
FEATURES
OLD VERSION (History)
* Added New Home * Added New Training * Added New Shops * Added New PKing * Added Anti-Crash * Added Anti-Null * Added Anti-SYIPKPKER * Added Anti-Dupe * Added New Models * Added Pest Control (with timers) * Added New Items * Added New Commands (instead of ::pickup its now ::item) * Added Random Events * Added D Claws, D Plate, D Pickaxe, DFull Helm, Barrows * Added Switching Mage Books * Added Tele Tab (Emote Tab) * Removed Horrid Panel at Top
NEW VERSION
* New Client Interface * Added Statius Warhammer, Bando's Scimitar * Fixed Dragon Kiteshield * Fixed Pk1, The area now works * Pk2 is now FunPk, And almost complete * Castle Wars Added *Only 60% Completed* * Pest Control Fixed/Changed *Only 60% Completed* * Fixed D Claws and The Spec
VIDEOS::::::
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5lu9Sqi67uQ]Fixed D Claws, D Claw Spec, Bandos Scimitar, Statius Warhammer[/url]
PICTURES::::::
[IMG]http://i725.photobucket.com/albums/ww255/dcrew09/wowman.jpg[/img]

------------------------------------------- Credits----------------------------------
Credits for Server: 60% Me 20% Whoever made Pimpscape! 10% To Moparscape 10% To all Tutorials
Credits for Client: 70% Me (New Interface, Models, Custom Models, Sprites, Right Click) 30% Skittlez (For Providing the Base)
Credits---------------------------------- -------------------------------------------
DOWNLOAD-=-=-=-=-=-
V6.0 Server: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?j4k5mtdg2uy]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?j4k5mtdg2uy[/url]
CLIENT Client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?kxz2mkgy3zm]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?kxz2mkgy3zm[/url]
DOWNLOAD-=-=-=-=-=-
CLIENT AND SERVER ARE EASY AND FULL EDITABLE!!
Note: The Port is 5555.
I Hope You Enjoy My Server Source As Much As I Did Creating It!

Anyway i love your server Demise – Too bad sorry mate i cant download coz i host full-time and its a 24/7 server.[/quote]

THERE WILL BE NO V7.0!

I know what your thinking, But instead the next version is v8.0.

The reason being is… Cant tell you (Its long) So dont forget to get your nerves running around for it Because it has 2 Pk’s and FunPK, You will see all the new features in version 8.0 anyway so it does not mattewr for now but while you wait you can still get your nerves running.
